title: Дочки-мачехи
overview: Ira, a young graduate of an economic high school, is in a difficult life situation. After the unsuccessful search for work, she has to go to work as a seller in a perfume shop to pay for the treatment of her mother. Once in one of the visitors Ira learns her school friend Alina. Learning about the problems of Ira, Alina persuades her father Sergei, the owner of a pharmaceutical company, to take Iru to work.
